com.brightcove.onceux

Class AbstractOnceUxManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.event.AbstractComponent
      • com.brightcove.onceux.AbstractOnceUxManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdInfoOverlayManager, AdMetadataStateManager, CompanionAdManager, SeekManager

    public abstract class AbstractOnceUxManager
extends AbstractComponent
    Provide a class to manage ad metadata state. When starting or completing a video, the ad metadata state is UNAVALABLE and any play requests will be denied. Upon successful completion of processing a data url, an AD_DATA_READY event will occur causing the ad metadata state to become AVAILABLE. Play will then be enabled or commence (if a previous play request has been saved).
